Director of Diversity, Equity, and Belonging

Seattle, WA

Appointed for 2023

2023/07/147/14/2023

Other Key Administrator Jobs

Westside School is delighted to announce that Chay Dixon will be their next Director of Diversity, Equity, and Belonging. Chay has been at the Academy for Precision Learning in Seattle, WA since 2019, serving as the school‚Äôs Lower School Director and Director of Curriculum and Instruction.

With just over 400 students, Westside School is recognized as West Seattle‚Äôs premier, accredited PK-grade 8 independent school program, helping students develop essential skills for the 21st century, including conceptual thinking, communication, and cooperation.

Sheri Ride Jobe

Director of Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Belonging

Philadelphia, PA

Appointed for 2023

2023/07/147/14/2023

Other Key Administrator Jobs

The Philadelphia School is thrilled to announce the appointment of Sheri Ride Jobe as their next Director of Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Belonging. Sheri comes to The Philadelphia School from the Shipley School in Bryn Mawr, PA, where she most recently served as the Interim Director of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion.

A progressive, co-educational day school of over 400 students in grades PK-8, The Philadelphia School has a long-standing and deep commitment to cultivating a diverse, equitable, and inclusive community. TPS is located and growing on two closely proximate campuses in the Fitler Square area of Philadelphia.

Ayesha Long

Chief Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Officer

New York, NY

Appointed for 2023

2023/07/147/14/2023

Other Key Administrator Jobs

St. Luke‚Äôs School is pleased to announce that their new Chief Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Officer will be Ayesha Long. Ayesha has served in a number of leadership roles at New York City independent schools, including as Director of Middle School at the City and Country School and as Diversity Coordinator at the Dalton School.

A co-educational independent school for 340 students in grades JK-8, St. Luke‚Äôs School is located in the heart of Manhattan‚Äôs West Village. The school combines academic excellence with a true sense of community to serve a diverse population of religious, spiritual, ethnic, and socioeconomic backgrounds.

Alexis Wright

Dean of Culturally Responsive Pedagogy

Natick, MA

Appointed for 2023

2023/07/147/14/2023

Other Key Administrator Jobs

Walnut Hill School for the Arts is delighted to announce the appointment of Alexis Wright as their Dean of Culturally Responsive Pedagogy. Alexis comes to Walnut Hill from the Facing History and Ourselves organization in Boston, where she serves as a Curriculum Developer and co-chair of the Employee Resource Group.

Established in 1893, Walnut Hill School for the Arts has undergone numerous transformations to become a dynamic boarding and day high school where nearly 300 students of all genders grow as bold artists, curious learners, and mindful citizens.

David Thompson

Director of Equity and Inclusion

New York, NY

Appointed for 2023

2023/07/147/14/2023

Other Key Administrator Jobs

Trinity School is pleased to announce the appointment of David Thompson as their next Director of Equity and Inclusion. David has been with the Bishop‚Äôs School in La Jolla, CA since 2013, serving as an English teacher, Associate Director of College Counseling, and, most recently, Director of Diversity, Equity, Community and Justice.

Trinity School is a co-educational, independent day school for 1035 students in grades K-12 located on the Upper West Side of Manhattan. The School is anchored in its Chapel program, which has origins in the Episcopal faith but has long been religiously inclusive and pluralistic in both spirit and practice.

Jenny Kravitz

Director of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

Weston, MA

Appointed for 2023

2023/07/147/14/2023

Other Key Administrator Jobs

The Rivers School is thrilled to announce that Jenny Kravitz will serve as their next Director of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion. Jenny is currently the Director of Equity and Justice at the Pike School in Andover, MA and was previously a curriculum coordinator for Westford Public Schools.

Located in historical Middlesex County, just 15 miles west of Boston, The Rivers School is a co-educational, private day school providing a rigorous, innovative academic curriculum to over 500 students in grades 6-12.

Todd Herauf

Head of School

Friendswood, TX

Appointed for 2024

2023/07/137/13/2023

Head of School/Leader Jobs

The Galloway School is delighted to announce the appointment of Todd Herauf as their next Head of School. Todd currently serves as the Associate Head of School for Academics at River Oaks Baptist School in Houston, TX, where he has been since 2016.

Located in a thriving suburb of Houston, the Galloway School serves 150 co-educational students in grades PK-5. Galloway offers an accelerated academic program rooted in Christian values and a caring environment.

Connie Urbanski

Principal

Birmingham, AL

Appointed for 2024

2023/07/137/13/2023

Head of School/Leader Jobs

Holy Family Cristo Rey Catholic High School is delighted to announce the appointment of Connie Urbanski as their next Principal. Connie currently serves as the Associate Superintendent of the Archdiocese of Atlanta, a role she has held since 2014. She was previously the Assistant Superintendent of the Diocese of Baton Rouge.

Holy Family Cristo Rey Catholic High School, a co-educational school of 150 students, is a member of the Cristo Rey Network, a national network of Catholic high schools that provide a rigorous college preparatory curriculum in the Catholic tradition and professional work study for urban young people who live in communities with limited educational options.

Matthew Cloud

Director of Advancement

Fort Wayne, IN

Appointed for 2024

2023/07/077/7/2023

Development Leadership Jobs

Canterbury School is pleased to announce that Matthew ‚ÄúMatt‚Äù Cloud will serve as their next Director of Advancement. Matt comes to Canterbury from the Casady School in Oklahoma City, OK, where he has been the Director of Campaigns since 2017.

Canterbury School is a co-educational day school offering a college preparatory education to nearly 800 students in early childhood through grade 12. The school is located on two campuses totaling 70 acres in the heart of northeast Indiana.

Katelyn Cassell

Director of Enrollment Management

Princeton, NJ

Appointed for 2023

2023/07/037/3/2023

Admissions Leadership Jobs

The Hun School of Princeton is pleased to announce the appointment of Katelyn Cassell as their incoming Director of Enrollment Management. Katelyn comes to the Hun School from San Francisco University High School, where she has worked in the admissions office since 2015.

The Hun School of Princeton is an all-gender day and boarding school of nearly 700 students across grades 6-PG. Founded in 1914, the Hun School is located on a 45-acre campus within walking distance to the heart of Princeton.

Laurence Kutler

Interim Head of School

Encino, CA

Appointed for 2023

2023/07/037/3/2023

Head of School/Leader Jobs

Valley Beth Shalom Harold M. Schulweis Day School is pleased to announce the appointment of Laurence ‚ÄúLarry‚Äù Kutler as their Interim Head of School for the 2023-24 school year. Larry most recently served as the Interim Head of Tucson Hebrew Academy, and was previously the Head of Herzliah High School in Montreal, Quebec.

Valley Beth Shalom Harold M. Schulweis Day School (VBSDS) shares its campus with Valley Beth Shalom synagogue and a preschool operated by the synagogue. VBSDS is a co-educational, Conservative Jewish school of approximately 200 students in grades K-6.

Tobin Wait

President

Beirut, Lebanon

Appointed for 2024

2023/06/276/27/2023

Head of School/Leader Jobs

International College is thrilled to announce the appointment of Tobin ‚ÄúToby‚Äù Wait as their next President. Toby currently serves as the Superintendent of the American International School in Kuwait, where he has been since 2021. He was previously the Superintendent for a California public school district for ten years.

International College (IC) is a co-educational, non-sectarian, non-profit, tuition-based international school with 3600 students and over 50 nationalities represented in the student body. IC‚Äôs mission is to educate students to be capable of initiative and critical thinking to serve as role models in a global society.

Adam Holden

Head of School

Raleigh, NC

Appointed for 2024

2023/06/276/27/2023

Head of School/Leader Jobs

Saint Mary‚Äôs School is pleased to announce the appointment of Adam Holden as their permanent Head of School. Adam has been the Interim Head of Saint Mary‚Äôs since 2022, and previously served as the Head of Admiral Farragut Academy in St. Petersburg, FL and Instituto Alberto Einstein in Panama City.

An independent, Episcopal, college preparatory, boarding and day school for 315 young women in grades 9-12, Saint Mary‚Äôs School is dedicated to academic excellence and personal achievement, preparing their students for college and life.

Kristen Rojas

Principal

Cincinnati, OH

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/236/23/2023

Head of School/Leader Jobs

Ursuline Academy of Cincinnati is thrilled to announce that Kristen Rojas will be their next Principal. Kristen, a 1985 graduate of Ursuline Academy, comes to Ursuline from Ohio‚Äôs Princeton City School District, where she currently serves as Principal of the Princeton Innovation Center.

Ursuline Academy is an independent, college preparatory Catholic high school for over 500 young women in grades 9-12. The school‚Äôs mission is to prepare young women for college and beyond by nurturing the soul, intellect, heart, and imagination.

Kari Loya

Interim Head of School

Austin, TX

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/226/22/2023

Head of School/Leader Jobs

Austin Jewish Academy is pleased to announce that Kari Loya will serve as their Interim Head of School for the 2023-24 school year. Kari most recently served as the Head of School for Good Hope Country Day School in Saint Croix, and was previously the Director of Institutional Advancement for the Dwight School in New York.

Austin Jewish Academy is a co-educational, independent, Jewish day school serving 127 students in grades K-8. Jewish and secular academics build on a strong project-based learning approach, and students experience the joy of their Jewish culture and values.

Jim Pautz

Associate Director of College Counseling

New York, NY

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/226/22/2023

College Counseling Leadership Jobs

The Dalton School is delighted to announce the appointment of Jim Pautz as their new Associate Director of College Counseling. Jim currently serves as the Dean of Students for Avenues: The World School, and was previously the Associate Director of the Harvard Law School Executive Education department.

The Dalton School, a progressive K-12 gender-inclusive school in Manhattan‚Äôs Upper East Side, is consistently recognized as one of the preeminent independent day schools in the nation. Dalton enrolls over 1300 students with approximately 350 faculty and staff.

Lawrence Momo

Interim Director of College Counseling

Washington, DC

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/206/20/2023

College Counseling Leadership Jobs

Sidwell Friends School is pleased to announce that Lawrence ‚ÄúLarry‚Äù Momo will serve as their Interim Director of College Counseling for the 2023-24 school year. Larry was previously the Director of College Counseling at New York‚Äôs Trinity School, where he served from 1994-2022.

Founded in 1883 as a Quaker, co-educational, urban day school, Sidwell Friends School continues to center Quaker values in its educational program and practices. Sidwell enrolls over 1100 students in grades PK-12, with just over 500 students in the Upper School.

Claudia Fritz

Director of Enrollment Management

Milwaukee, WI

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/166/16/2023

Admissions Leadership Jobs

The University School of Milwaukee is delighted to announce the appointment of Claudia Fritz as their new Director of Enrollment Management. Claudia has been at the University School of Milwaukee since 2008, serving as Associate Director of Enrollment Management and Associate Director of Auxiliary Programs.

The University School of Milwaukee (USM) is a PK-12 day school of 1140 students, located on a 125-acre campus on the northern edge of Milwaukee County. USM is Wisconsin‚Äôs top-rated independent school offering an outstanding college-preparatory school experience in a supportive and inclusive community.

Melissa Ritchie

Director of Development

New York, NY

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/166/16/2023

Development Leadership Jobs

City and Country School is thrilled to announce that Melissa Ritchie will serve as their next Director of Development. Melissa comes to City and Country School from Brooklyn Heights Montessori School, where she has been the Director of Institutional Advancement since 2016.

City and Country School is a co-educational, independent, progressive school for 350 children ages 2-13 located in the Greenwich Village neighborhood of Manhattan. Students at City and Country learn by doing and develop a strong sense of responsibility and community through group experiences.

Stephen Walswick

President

Anaheim, CA

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/156/15/2023

Head of School/Leader Jobs

Servite High School is delighted to announce the appointment of Stephen Walswick as their new President. Stephen has served as Servite‚Äôs Principal since 2021, and as Interim President since December 2022. He was previously Servite‚Äôs Assistant Principal of Curriculum and Educational Technology from 2015-2018, before becoming Principal of Central Catholic High School in San Antonio, TX.

Located on a 15-acre campus, Servite High School is a Catholic preparatory school for 800 young men in grades 9-12. Servite offers a world-class curriculum and forms faith-filled leaders with the knowledge, character, and wisdom they will need for success in college and life.

Sheila Sheldon

Chief Finance and Operations Officer

New York, NY

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/146/14/2023

Financial Leadership Jobs

St. Luke‚Äôs School is pleased to announce the appointment of Sheila Sheldon as their next Chief Finance and Operations Officer. Sheila has been with the Archdiocese of New York since 2015, serving first as their Chief Accounting Officer before becoming the Executive Director of Finance in 2022.

St. Luke‚Äôs School occupies an unusual and expansive two-acre urban campus on a landmark block in Manhattan, often described as a ‚Äúsecret garden‚Äù in the heart of the West Village. St. Luke‚Äôs provides a dynamic and well-rounded education for 340 students from grades PK-8.

Richard Kasmin

Chief Finance and Operations Officer

Morristown, NJ

Appointed for 2023

2023/06/136/13/2023

Financial Leadership Jobs
